properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Calhoun and Paradise

.Water levels remain elevated on the Green River. Moderate Flooding
will continue at Paradise with little change in water levels expected
through the weekend. The ongoing crest at Calhoun will be followed by
a fall to below flood stage on Friday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise
* until further notice.
* At  7:15 PM Tuesday the stage was 386.3 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will fall to 386.1 feet Wednesday morning,
followed by a rise to a secondary crest at 386.7 feet by Thursday
evening, and then a slow fall into the weekend.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
